headline: 1 AI Super Stock Is Starting to Rebound, but Shares Still Look Cheap
summary: Datadog stock remains more than 35% below the all-time high it reached four years ago.  Many organizations are rapidly adopting AI-powered tools, which presents an opportunity for Datadog.  Let's take a look at one such stock, Datadog (NASDAQ: DDOG).

raw.headline: 1 AI Super Stock Is Starting to Rebound, but Shares Still Look Cheap
raw.summary: Datadog stock remains more than 35% below the all-time high it reached four years ago.  Many organizations are rapidly adopting AI-powered tools, which presents an opportunity for Datadog.  Let's take a look at one such stock, Datadog (NASDAQ: DDOG).

headline: Couchbase jumps 28% after agreeing to be acquired for $24.50 per share
summary: Shares of Couchbase (BASE) have jumped $5.40, or 28.5%, to $24.33 after the company announced a definitive agreement to be acquired by Haveli Investments for $24.50 per share in an all-cash transaction valued at approximately $1.5B. Some other names in the cloud-based database platforms, NoSQL database, data storage, an infrastructure software space include MongoDB (MDB), DigitalOcean (DOCN), Elastic (ESTC) and Datadog (DDOG). Published first on TheFly – the ultimate source for real-time, market
